mods.abstract: Malcolm X speaking to a crowd at rally in Durham. The rally had been scheduled for the NCCU campus, but was banned, and moved to a lodge on North Roxboro St.
mods.accessCondition: This image is part of the Durham Herald Co. Newspaper Photograph Collection at Wilson Library at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Permission to use this image must be obtained from Wilson Library.
mods.note: Item description, identifier (if applicable), Box and Folder information. Durham Civil Rights Heritage Project (NCC.0040). North Carolina Collection, Durham County Library, NC.
